header-title: Wikimania 2019 - Kugwiritsa ntchito maphunziro a Scholarship
mock: Iyi ndi malo osungirako masewera olimbitsa thupi pokhapokha, gwiritsani ntchito kuyesa.
not-open:
Cholinga cha 2019 Wikimania Scholarship sikunatsegulidwe. Kuti mudziwe zambiri, onani:
  • Za Wikimania
  • Za maphunziro
deadline-passed:
Ntchito yomaliza maphunziro pa Scholarship ndi March 15, 23:59 UTC.

Tidzadziwitsa olembapo mu May 2019 za zotsatira za ntchito zawo.

Chonde tawonani scholarships page pa wiki kuti mudziwe zambiri.
form-intro:
Ili ndilo pempho lothandizira kuti mupite ku Wikimania 2019 , msonkhano wa pachaka wapadziko lonse womwe uli pa Project Wikimedia . Mphoto idzalandira mphoto yomwe idzapereke msonkho wa msonkhano, hotelo, ndi ulendo wopita ku Wikimania ku Stockholm, Sweden, pa 14-18 August, 2019.

Maofesi angaperekedwe m'chinenero chilichonse , koma aliyense wopempha ayenera apereke umboni wa luso la Chingerezi omwe ali pamlingo womwe ungawathandize kutenga nawo mbali ku Wikimania, msonkhano womwe umapangidwa makamaka mu Chingerezi. Maluso oyenerera a Chingerezi angasonyezedwe muzowonjezera kapena kwinakwake.

Chonde mosamala kulingalira zosowa zanu zachuma musanapemphe ku maphunziro kuti mupite ku Wikimania. Pali ndalama zochepa zomwe zilipo ndipo ambiri ofuna ntchito alibe ndalama zokhala nawo ku Wikimania popanda mwayi umenewu. Zikomo kwambiri

Chonde onani ngati mukufuna zambiri ndiye mphindi 10 kuti mutsirize ntchitoyi, chonde lembani mayankho anu m'dongosolo lolemba , tsatirani tsamba ili ndikusindikiza ndi kusunga mayankho anu mmalo omwe musanayambe. Mapulogalamuwa angapereke cholakwika ("Chosowa cha CSRF chosowa kapena chosayenera") ngati chatseguka kwa ena nthawi 15 musanatumize.

Nthawi yomalizira yogwiritsira ntchito ndi March 15, 2019, 23:59 UTC .
form-intro-privacy: Kuti mudziwe zambiri zokhudza chinsinsi komanso kusamalira deta, chonde onani ndondomeko yachinsinsi yofunsira ntchito .
form-scholarship:
Chaka chino cha Wikimania 2019, Wikimedia Foundation idzapereka maphunziro othandizira omwe angapereke ndalama zonse zolembetsera (zomwe zikuphatikizapo malo okhala ku Wikimania); Komabe, maphunziro apaderawa sangalolere kuyenda kapena zina zofunikira. Mosiyana ndi izi, maphunziro odzaza amadzaza ulendo, kulembetsa ndi zina mwachindunji.

Chonde fotokozani mtundu uti wa maphunziro a Wikimania Foundation omwe mukufuna. Dziwani kuti iwo amene amasankha "Ndikufuna maphunziro apadera, koma athe kupezeka ngati atapereka mwayi wophunzira." idzakambidwa malinga ndi malamulo osankhidwa .
form-scholarship-either: Ndikupempha kuti ndipeze maphunziro apadera, koma ndingathe kupezeka ngati ndikupatsidwa maphunziro apadera.
form-error: Fomu yanu ili ndi zolakwika. Chonde konzani zolakwika zotsatirazi ndikupatsanso fomuyo.
form-save-error: Panali vuto la dongosolo kusunga ntchito yanu. Chonde yesaninso.
form-reports-error: Chonde perekani mauthenga kwa malipoti anu apamwamba a maphunziro.
form-scholarorgs-error: Chonde tiuzeni mabungwe omwe mukuwapempha kuti mupindule nawo.
form-wmfAgreeGuardian-error: Chonde lowetsani dzina la mlonda wanu.
form-username-error: Chonde lowetsani dzina lanu pawunivesite yanu yaikulu ya Wikimedia.
form-project-error: Chonde sankhani Wikimedia project yogwira ntchito.
form-community-error: Chonde sankhani chinenero chanu choyambirira pa wiki.
form-involvement-error: Chonde fotokozani momwe mukugwirira ntchito ndi Wikimedia miradi.
form-contribution-error: Chonde fotokozani momwe mukugwirizira ndi zopereka muzinthu zina osati zolemba za Wikimedia.
form-experience-error: Chonde perekani zambiri za momwe mukugawira zomwe mukukumana nazo ndi anthu ammudzi.
form-collaboration-error: Chonde perekani zambiri zazokambirana zanu ndi zina Wikimedians kapena Wikimedia mabungwe
form-willgetvisa-error: Kuti mupite, chonde avomereze ku zofunikira za visa.
form-agreestotravelconditions-error: Kuti mupitirize, chonde avomereze ku mgwirizano wamakilomita.
form-grantfortravelonly-error: Kuti muyambe, chonde muvomere kugwiritsa ntchito thandizoli pokhapokha paulendo.
form-agreestofriendlyspace-error: Kuti mupitirize, chonde muvomere kuti muzitsatira ndondomeko ya malo okondana.
form-infotrue-error: Kuti mupitirize, chonde vomerezani kuti zomwe mwatipatsa ndi zoona komanso zolondola.
form-wmfagree-error: Kuti mupite, chonde avomereze ku chilolezo cha ufulu.
form-wmfAgreeName-error: Chonde lembani dzina lanu lonse m'munda wopatsidwa kuti muvomereze zomwe zilipo.
form-engage10-error: Chonde sankhani momwe mwagwirira ntchito ku Wikimedia movement
form-staffOrg-error: Chonde tisonyezeni bungwe la Wikimedia omwe mwalipidwa kapena wogwira nawo ntchito.
form-boardOrg-error: Chonde onetsani bungwe la Wikimedia omwe muli membala wa bungwe.
form-nationality: Ufulu Wachikhalidwe (Ndani wapereka / adzatulutsa pasipoti yanu?):
translate-page:
Tikufuna kuti ndondomeko yothandizira maphunziro ikhale yomasulira m'zinenero zambiri momwe zingathere.

Chonde pemphani ufulu wa omasulira pa translatewiki.net ndipo mutatha mukhoza yambani kumasulira.
login-error: Dzina lachinsinsi ndi liwu lachinsinsi likufunika.
recover-account-email:
Pempho lapangidwa pa $3 kuti ikonzenso mawu achinsinsi kwa akaunti yanu.

Zosintha zadzidzidzi:

dzina lapafupi: $1
kulandira URL: $2

Maulendo obwezeretsa amatha mu maora 48. Ngati simunapange pempholi mungathe kunyalanyaza imelo iyi. Akaunti yanu siinasokonezedwe.

Modzichepetsa,
Amapereka oyang'anira ndondomeko
recover-account-success: Mauthenga obwezeretsa atumizidwa. Fufuzani imelo yanu ndi famu ya spam.
reset-password-bad-token: Chizindikiritso chosavomerezeka kapena chosatha chomwe chinaperekedwa.
error-message: Chosayembekezereka chachitika ndipo tikuyesetsa kuthetsa vuto. Chonde yesaninso kamphindi.
404-message: Tsamba lomwe mudapempha silikupezeka. Chonde onani chingwe/URL ndikuyesanso.
review-view-involvement: Kodi mwasintha chiyani kapena muthandizirapo kuti mupititse patsogolo wiki yanu kapena mderalo? Kodi mwatsogolera kapena kukonza chilichonse mwazochitikazi?
review-view-contrib-explain: Ndi chiyani chosangalatsa chomwe chinachitika chifukwa cha ntchitozi?
review-view-experience-explain: Kodi mumakonda bwanji kugawira zomwe munakumana nazo (kapena zinthu zomwe mwaphunzira) ndi dera lanu? Zitsanzo za mndandanda wa ma-wiki / malipoti, zolemba za blog, zokambirana za meetup, etc. ndi olandiridwa pano.
review-view-collaboration-explain: Kodi mukugwirizana ndi ziganizo zina za Wikimedians kapena Wikimedia?
review-view-missing-knowledge-explain: Mutu wa Wikimania 2019 ukutanthawuzira kuthandizira mawu osamveketsedwa ndi zoperewera zadzidzidzi pamene tikuyenda. Kodi ndi mitundu yanji, mtundu wa chidziwitso, kapena nkhani zomwe ziri zofunika kwa inu ndipo zikusowabe ku Wikimedia? Kodi mungakonde kutenga nawo mbali pa Wikimania kuti muthandize kuthana ndi izi?
review-view-travel-only: Kodi mungagwiritse ntchito thandizo la ulendo?
review-view-friendly-space: Mukugwirizana ndi ndondomeko yapamwamba ya malo?
csrf-message: Chopempha chomwe chinaperekedwa chinali kusowa chopempha choperekera chithandizo. Chonde bwererani ku mawonekedwe, tumizani tsamba ndikuyesanso.
